title: Yajima-kun no Senzoku Friend
original_name: 矢嶋くんの専属フレンド
sinopse:
After being caught kissing his senpai, Kaoru Umegaki is ready to do anything to make Yajima-kun keep his secret. But instead of being extorted as he was expecting, Yajima-kun asks him to become his friend.

Just what could he be planning?

(Source: Hero Scans)
